main event: A round object with a tail, the size of a basketball at arm's length, was sighted moving in an easterly direction and disappeared by fading into a fog.
interesting points: The object was observed visually for two minutes., The object was likely a jet aircraft according to the description., The sighting occurred on August 21, 1956., The location of the sighting was Fontana, California., The report was part of the Project Blue Book, an official U.S. Air Force UFO investigation program.
sighted object: one round object with a tail
